effect: Visual figment that cannot extend beyond four 10-ft. cubes + one 10-ft. cube/level

components.material_text: Snow or ice in quantity sufficient to form the duplicate, plus powdered ruby worth 100 gp per HD of the simulacrum

name: Siphon Magic
targets: One spell effect or magical item

components.material_text: A pinch of dust and a few drops of water

name: Slow
targets: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

name: Snare

components.material_text: A length of vine, rope, or similar cordage, which must be laid out in a circle

targets: Circle of rope or vine touched

name: Soften Earth and Stone
saving_throw: None or Reflex negates; see text

name: Sonic Thrust
targets: One creature or object/level within range

components.material_text: A gem worth at least 1,000 gp per HD of the subject

name: Spark
targets: One Fine object of a flammable substance

components.material_text: Seven sharp thorns or small twigs
Seven sharp thorns or small twigs

components.focus_text: A holy symbol

components.material_text: Lime, sand, and a drop of water

name: Stinking Cloud

components.material_text: A rotten egg or several skunk cabbage leaves

effect: Cloud spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high

components.material_text: Granite and diamond dust worth 250 gp

name: Stone Shape
targets: Stone or stone object touched, up to 10 cu. ft. + 1 cu. ft./level

name: Stone to Flesh
targets: One petrified creature or stone object

name: Suffocation, Mass
targets: One creature/level, no two more than 30 ft. apart

components.focus_text: A tiny bag and a small candle
A tiny bag and a small candle
A tiny bag and a small candle
A tiny bag and a small candle
A tiny bag and a small candle
A tiny bag and a small candle
A tiny bag and a small candle
A tiny bag and a small candle
A tiny bag and a small candle

name: Summon Minor Ally
effect: One or more summoned animals or elementals

name: Summon Swarm
effect: Swarm of bats, rats, or spiders

name: Sunbeam
duration: 1 round/level or until all beams are used

name: Sunmetal
targets: One metal weapon or up to 50 projectiles

components.material_text: Incense and powdered diamond worth 5,000 gp
Incense and powdered diamond worth 1,000 gp
Incense and powdered diamond worth 5,000 gp
Incense and powdered diamond worth 5,000 gp

components.focus_text: A tuning fork

name: Synaptic Pulse
area: All enemies in a 30-ft. burst centered on you

components.material_text: Rare herbs and oils worth 250 gp

name: Swarm Strike
effect: One swarm of Tiny or smaller creatures

components.material_text: Ink and fine parchment worth 50 gp

name: Telekinesis
saving_throw: Will negates (object) or Fortitude negates (see text)

name: Teleport
targets: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures

name: Teleport Object
target: One object weighing up to 50 lb./level

components.material_text: Gem worth at least 1,000 gp per HD of target
Sprinkling of holy water and diamonds worth 25,000 gp
An ointment for the eyes worth 250 gp, made from mushroom powder, saffron, and fat

name: Undeath to Death

components.material_text: Holy water and rare oils worth 500 gp

area: One or more undead creatures within a 40-ft.-radius burst

name: Unhallow

components.material_text: Herbs, oils, and incense worth 1,000 gp plus additional material component (see text)

area: 40-ft. radius emanating from the touched point

name: Unholy Aura
area: Allies within a 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on you

name: Veil
targets: Any number of creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

name: Wail of the Banshee
targets: One living creature/level within a 40-ft.-radius spread

name: Wall of Acid
effect: Opaque sheet of acid up to 20 ft. long/level, 20 ft. high, 1 in. thick

name: Wall of Bones
effect: Wall of bones up to 5 ft. long/level, 10 ft. high, 1 ft. thick

name: Wall of Fire
effect: Opaque sheet of flame up to 20 ft. long/level or a ring of fire with a radius of up to 5 ft./two levels

name: Wall of Force
effect: Wall whose area is up to one 10-ft. square/level

name: Wall of Ice

components.material_text: A piece of quartz or rock crystal

effect: Ice plane whose area is up to one 10-ft. square/level, or hemisphere of ice with a radius of up to 3 ft. + 1 ft./level
saving_throw: Reflex negates or Reflex partial; see text

name: Wall of Iron
effect: Iron wall whose area is up to one 5-ft. square/level; wall is 1 inch thick/4 levels

name: Wall of Lava
effect: Sheet of molten rock up to 20 ft. long/level, 20 ft. high, 1 in. thick

name: Wall of Stone
effect: Stone wall whose area is up to one 5-ft. square/level; wall is 1 inch thick/4 levels

name: Wall of Thorns
effect: Wall of thorny brush up to one 10-ft. cube/level

name: Wall of Water
effect: Sheet of water up to 20 ft. long/level, 20 ft. high, 1 in. thick

name: Warp Metal
targets: Up to a 10-lb. mass of metal/level

name: Warp Wood
targets: One Small or smaller wooden object/2 levels; or 1 larger object

name: Weird
area: Any number of creatures within a 30-ft.-radius spread
saving_throw: Will disbelief (if interacted with), then Fortitude partial

name: Whip of Spiders
effect: One whip made of living spiders

name: Wind Walk
targets: You and one touched creature/three levels

name: Wind Wall

components.material_text: A tiny fan and a feather of exotic origin

effect: Wall of wind up to 10 ft./level long and 5 ft./level high

name: Word of Chaos
area: Nongood creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you

name: Word of Recall
target: You and touched objects or other willing creatures

name: Zealous Might
area: Allies in a 20-ft.-radius burst centered on you

name: Zone of Truth
area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
